method: Combine the sugar and orange juice in a large saucepan and bring to the boil.  Stir in the cranberries and clementine zest (if using), then simmer until the cranberries are tender but still holding their shape – this will take about 5 minutes if using frozen cranberries and a little longer if using fresh.  Refrigerate until needed, the sauce will thicken as it cools. Remove from the fridge an hour before serving.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz light brown sugar,  100ml/3½fl oz fresh orange juice,  250g/9oz fresh or frozen cranberries,  1 clementine, finely grated zest only (optional)
